entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023
